name: SysML v2 Port Definition Extraction
description: Extract all port definitions with their directions and item types from a SysML v2 model.
prompt:
Extract all `port def` declarations from this SysML v2 model.

Return a JSON array where each object contains:
- "name": the port definition name
- "items": array of objects with {"direction": "in"|"out"|"inout", "name": item name, "type": item type}

Example output format:
```json
[
  {"name": "FuelCmdPort", "items": [{"direction": "in", "name": "fuelCmd", "type": "FuelCmd"}]},
  {"name": "DataPort", "items": [{"direction": "out", "name": "data", "type": "DataPacket"}]}
]
```

Include ALL port definitions, even empty ones.
